about_the_game:
Equip yourself with the "Agency Weapon Pack", bringing three new weapons to your arsenal:

  • De Lisle Carbine - stealth is your ally with this suppressed bolt-action rifle, perfect for covert operations and silent takedowns.
  • M1941 Rifle - versatility meets precision in this semi-automatic rifle, offering a perfect balance for both mid and long-range engagements.
  • Auto-5 Shotgun - unleash devastating firepower in close-quarters combat with the Auto-5, a rapid-firing shotgun known for its fire rate and stopping power.

Upgrade your loadout and dominate the battlefield with the "Agency Weapon Pack" today!
detailed_description:
Equip yourself with the "Agency Weapon Pack", bringing three new weapons to your arsenal:

  • De Lisle Carbine - stealth is your ally with this suppressed bolt-action rifle, perfect for covert operations and silent takedowns.
  • M1941 Rifle - versatility meets precision in this semi-automatic rifle, offering a perfect balance for both mid and long-range engagements.
  • Auto-5 Shotgun - unleash devastating firepower in close-quarters combat with the Auto-5, a rapid-firing shotgun known for its fire rate and stopping power.

Upgrade your loadout and dominate the battlefield with the "Agency Weapon Pack" today!
legal_notice:
RealRTCW is a free modification for Return to Castle Wolfenstein.
RealRTCW is based on Return to Castle Wolfenstein single player GNU GPL Source Code.
Store art based on original game promo arts made by TODD HART DESIGN for ID Software.
name: RealRTCW - Agency Weapon Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Equip yourself with the "Agency Weapon Pack", bringing three new weapons to your arsenal - silent De Lisle Carbine, precise M1941 Rifle and unstoppable Auto-5 Shotgun.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Ukrainian, French*, Italian*, Polish
*languages with full audio support
